articles.title: Democrats are so angry, one senator from New Hampshire faces blowback from her daughter
articles.description:
Senator Jeanne Shaheen of New Hampshire voted to move to end the shutdown. But her daughter Stefany Shaheen, a congressional candidate in their state, sharply criticized the deal.

The post Democrats are so angry, one senator from New Hampshire faces blowback from her daughter appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Senator Jeanne Shaheen voted to end the government shutdown on November 10, 2025.
Her daughter, Stefany Shaheen, criticized the deal, highlighting family tensions in politics.
This conflict may affect voter perceptions in New Hampshire, impacting Boston's political landscape.
